summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Segbeauty empty bottle 160083 Review Date: 2018/08/29 Store: Segbeauty Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Segbeauty', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Capacity': '160 Milliliters', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Water,Cleansing,Hair Spray,Indoor', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '8 x 2 x 2 inches; 3.52 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'AM-160083-A01-JPN', 'UPC': '612520575953'} Review Text: Sweet! These are awesome, continuous ultra fine mist. Funny tho now I see these all over the place, even top shelf air fresheners. Or maybe I never just noticed before. Review Title: Sweeet! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Miss Jessie's Creme de la Creme, 8 Fl. Ounce Review Date: 2018/10/29 Store: Miss Jessie's Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.5 x 1.5 x 7.28 inches; 9.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SG_B01MT1RCF4_US', 'UPC': '859220001706'} Review Text: I don't know what my mama and aunties used on my hair as a child (circa 1980) but this smells exactly like it! It's a great conditioner to moisturize with when added in a spray bottle of aloe vera juice (I am natural with 4C hair). And it makes my hair smell good! I don't know WHAT it is...Prell? VO5?? I am not certain but I mainly bought it for the smell whether it was good at conditioning or not lol Review Title: Smells like my childhood! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: FIANCEE BODY MIST PURE SHAMPOO 50ml Review Date: 2021/08/30 Store: Fiancée Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Fiancée', 'Item Volume': '50 Milliliters', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.75 x 1.65 x 1.65 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'ida laboratories'} Review Text: This stuff smells like something green, men's deodorant, and a wet bathroom. The smell does not change, it just stays the same the whole time. I was ready to send this back with the mailman as soon as I smelled it but unfortunately it's not returnable so into the trash. It's not even good as a toilet spray. Somebody may like it but I don't. It would be better suited for a male.
UPDATE: (A few hours later) When I tried to wash it off to get rid of the smell, what was left smells better and tolerable lol I experienced the same thing with Philosophy Snow Angel - smells annoying but skin smells good when product is washed off. Very strange indeed. Review Title: Blehhh Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Wholesale AVON ROLL ON DEODORANT NIGHT MAGIC 2.6 OZ Review Date: 2021/08/30 Store: AVON Average Rating: 5.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'AVON', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '2.6 Fl Oz', 'Item Volume': '2.6 Fluid Ounces', 'UPC': '888761023625'} Review Text: I had this when I was in high school (1990-1993) and it was more musk-y but this is more sweet. It smells good but it isn't the same as the original. Review Title: Smells Different but Still Good Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The analysis of the purchase history reveals distinct preferences and patterns. The individual consistently favors products with high ratings, often above 4.5, indicating a penchant for quality. Sentiments reflect strong emotional connections, particularly with scents reminiscent of childhood or past experiences, highlighting an appreciation for nostalgic fragrances. This person leans towards hair and body care products designed for specific needs, such as moisturizing and cleansing.

Common themes emerge around personal care, particularly hair and fragrance, signaling a focus on both functionality and sensory experiences. The strong reactions to scent—both positive and negative—serve as a critical factor in product satisfaction. However, a notable price sensitivity is evident; despite being willing to spend on favored items, dissatisfaction leads to immediate dismissal, suggesting higher expectations for value.

Overall, this person shows a core preference for quality, nostalgic scents, and effective products, demonstrating a mix of emotional attachment and practical criteria in their shopping behavior.

target_interaction.title: Works Fast!
target_interaction.text: I used gel polish WITHOUT a foundation base coat (I did have a top coat) and that stuffed allowed me to peel my gel polish off in just about 3 to 5 minutes! I used it on polish WITH a foundation base coat and it took way longer, about as long as acetone would. Again this was with gel polish, not gel nail builder/sculpter/overlay. Also, scuffing up the top layer coat of polish DOES make all the difference and allows it to work fast. Also, I can see why they don't want people to get it on their skin: it has a slight tightening sensation. Not painful for me personally or anything like that - just a feeling that something is on there.
target_interaction.title_meta: AIQIUSHA 2 Pack Gel Nail Polish Remover, Professional Remove For Gel Nail & Acrylic Nail Within 3-5 Minutes, Quick & Easy & No Hurt Nails - No Need for Foil, Soaking Or Wrapping, 0.5 Fl Oz/Pack, Blue

videos.title: 2 Pack Gel Nail Polish Remover, Professional Remove For Gel Nail & Acrylic Nail Within 3-5 Minutes
